column4: anyone had problems running Live CD or Install CD from the freebies???
"the freebies?"  i downloaded each here for free and they work well here if you mean that
okay, just aquick intro: warty is the current stable release, version 4.10.  hoary is the not-yet-released (but close) development release, version 5.04
oh thanks guess it's the warty release
cool, wish i could help with the blank screen, but it's out of my league
i somewhat suspect it's video related, are you perhaps on a video card that it doesn't like?
I guess so but there's no option to tweak it
i'm no guru with it, just hoping to trigger someone else to help
in console there, the output from "dmesg | less" might tell you something about your hardware, if that's any help, not sure
I dont get anything not even console
mdk sees and likes your hardwre, so it knows it all
just a quick information point, do you get anything at all of potential interest just before the blanking?
just the UBUNTU splash... if I press ESC I see when its detecting hardware, etc. then same thing... blank
i know you don't want to isntall right now, but ... does that cd get anywhere? (choose expert and abort before anything would write to the hard drive)
then that cd can definitely cope with your video card, so we learned something
